Upgrade.Name: Tantive IV
Upgrade.Text: Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional {crew} and 1 additional {team} upgrade icon.

Upgrade.Name: A-Wing Test Pilot
Upgrade.Text: Your upgrade bar gains 1 Elite Upgrade icon. You cannot equip 2 of the same Elite Upgrade cards. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: Outrider
Upgrade.Text: While you have a {cannon} Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform {cannon} secondary weapons attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

Upgrade.Name: Dauntless
Upgrade.Text: After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform one free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Virago
Upgrade.Text: Your upgrade bar gains the {system} and {illicit} upgrade icons. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor
Upgrade.Text: Your upgrade bar gains the {cannon}, {torpedo} or {missile} upgrade icon.

Upgrade.Name: IG-2000
Upgrade.Text: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

Upgrade.Name: BTL-A4 Y-wing
Upgrade.Text: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a {turret} secondary weapon.

Upgrade.Name: Andrasta
Upgrade.Text: Your upgrade bar gains two additional {bomb} upgrade icons.

Upgrade.Name: TIE/x1
Upgrade.Text: Your upgrade bar gains the {system} upgrade icon. If you equip a {system} upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).

Upgrade.Name: Hound's Tooth
Upgrade.Text: After you are destroyed, before you are removed from the play area, you may deploy the Nashtah Pup Pilot. It cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Name: Assailer
Upgrade.Text: When defending, if the target section has a reinforce token you may change 1 {focus} result to an {evade} result.

Upgrade.Name: Impetuous
Upgrade.Text: After you perform an attack that destroys an enemy ship you may acquire a target lock.

Upgrade.Name: Instigator
Upgrade.Text: After you perform a recover action, recover 1 additional shield.

Upgrade.Name: Ghost
Upgrade.Text: Equip the Phantom title card to a friendly Attack Shuttle and dock it to this ship. After you execute a maneuver you may deploy it from your rear guides.

Upgrade.Name: Phantom
Upgrade.Text: While you are docked, the Ghost can perform primary weapon attacks from its special firing arc and at the end of the Combat Phase, it may perform an additional attack with an equipped {turret}. If it performs this attack, it cannot attack again this round.

Upgrade.Name: Mist Hunter
Upgrade.Text: Your action bar gains the {barrel roll} action icon. You must equip 1 "Tractor Beam" Upgrade Card (paying the squad cost as normal).

Upgrade.Name: Punishing One
Upgrade.Text: Increase your primary weapon value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Proton Torpedoes
Upgrade.Text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {crit} result.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
Upgrade.Text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change up to 3 of your blank results to {focus} results.

Upgrade.Name: Flechette Torpedoes
Upgrade.Text: Attack (target lock): Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack. After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: Ion Torpedoes
Upgrade.Text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token.

Upgrade.Name: Bomb Loadout
Upgrade.Text: Your upgrade bar gains the {bomb} icon.

Upgrade.Name: Extra Munitions
Upgrade.Text: When you equip this card, place 1 ordnance token on each equipped {torpedo}, {missile}, and {bomb} Upgrade card. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead.

Upgrade.Name: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, after dealing damage, remove 1 shield token from the defender

Upgrade.Name: Ion Cannon Turret
Upgrade.Text: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

Upgrade.Name: Blaster Turret
Upgrade.Text: Attack (focus): Spend 1 focus token to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

Upgrade.Name: Autoblaster Turret
Upgrade.Text: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). Your {hit} results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel {crit} results before {hit} results.

Upgrade.Name: Twin Laser Turret
Upgrade.Text: Attack: Perform this attack twice (even against a ship outside your firing arc). Each time this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage. Then cancel all dice results.

Upgrade.Name: Weapons Guidance
Upgrade.Text: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change one of your blank results to a {hit} result.

Upgrade.Name: Comms Relay
Upgrade.Text: You cannot have more than 1 evade token. During the End phase, do not remove an unused evade token from your ship.
